wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Ian Lennox Freer  (born (1941-05-18)18 May 1941) is a former British Army officer who commanded 5th Division.

response: *Ian Freer (British Army officer) (born 1941), British Army general

Ian Freer is a British non-fiction author and film magazine editor, who has written several books relating to films. His most recent work was The Complete Spielberg, a guide to the films of Steven Spielberg.Spielberg, Ian Freer Complete Spielberg book, Accessed 2007
